markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Anchoring Aura](/Feats.aspx?ID=249) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 114 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Fiendsbane Oath](/Feats.aspx?ID=220)

</column>

---

Your aura hampers fiends’ teleportation. Your aura attempts to counteract teleportation spells cast by fiends within 15 feet, using the spell level and DC of your devotion spells.
name: Anchoring Aura
